description:
Widely used for both systems and application development, C is a powerful
language at the heart of many more modern languages, like JavaScript and
Objective-C. In this course, professor Isac Artzi dissects the anatomy of C,
from data types, strings, and variables to simple functions. He'll show how
these basic elements fit together in control structures like loops and if-else
statementsâ€”where the real logic behind your code comes into play. Plus, learn
how C organizes information into arrays and how you can manage memory
resources with pointers.  
  
C is a great first step for new programmers, and a way to broaden and deepen
your knowledge if you've already programmed for a while. Press Play to start
learning.
title: C Essential Training
